bench

Class Bench

  • java.lang.Object
    • bench.Bench
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICoach, IContestant, IReferee

    public class Bench
extends java.lang.Object
implements IReferee, ICoach, IContestant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bench(int nContestantsTeamA, int nContestantsTeamB)
      We need to know how many contestants there are in the bench, for that we pass how many contestants there are in the team A or B

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assertTrialDecision()
      The referee will waken up the coaches with the trialDecisionTaken = true and with the notifyAll().
      void callContestants(java.lang.String team)
      In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team".
      void callTrial()
      The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero.
      void followCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team, int idC)
      The coaches are waken up in operation followCoachAdvice by the last of their selected contestants to stand in position.
      void reviewNotes(java.lang.String team)
      In coach life cycle, transition between "watch trial" and "wait for referee command".
      void seatDown(java.lang.String team)
      In Contestants life cycle, transition between "doYourBest" and "seat at the bench" SEAT_AT_THE_BENCH – blocking state the contestants are waken up in operation callContestants by their coaches if they are selected to join the next trial
      void waitForAssertTrialDecision()
      The coaches will wait until the referee make the decision of notify the referees in the assertTrialDecision.
      void waitForCallContestants(java.lang.String team, int idC)
      The contestants will wait here to be called to the trial in the bench.
      void waitForCallTrial()
      The coaches are sleeping in this method waiting that the referee inform and can select the next team.
      void waitForFollowCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team)
      The coach will wait until the last contestant stand in position to then follow the coach advice.
      void wakeUp()
      This method will wakeup all the entities in the bench and declare that the match was ended.

    • Method Detail

      • callTrial

        public void callTrial()
        The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero. The coachs are sleeping and need the flag callTrialTaken true to procede. In the final there is a notifyAll() to wake up all the entities in the Bench.
        Specified by:
        callTrial in interface IReferee

      • waitForCallTrial

        public void waitForCallTrial()
        The coaches are sleeping in this method waiting that the referee inform and can select the next team.
        Specified by:
        waitForCallTrial in interface ICoach

      • assertTrialDecision

        public void assertTrialDecision()
        The referee will waken up the coaches with the trialDecisionTaken = true and with the notifyAll().
        Specified by:
        assertTrialDecision in interface IReferee

      • waitForAssertTrialDecision

        public void waitForAssertTrialDecision()
        The coaches will wait until the referee make the decision of notify the referees in the assertTrialDecision.
        Specified by:
        waitForAssertTrialDecision in interface ICoach

      • reviewNotes

        public void reviewNotes(java.lang.String team)
        In coach life cycle, transition between "watch trial" and "wait for referee command". The coach will wait until 10 contestants are in the bench and then will continue.
        Specified by:
        reviewNotes in interface ICoach
        Parameters:
        team -

      • callContestants

        public void callContestants(java.lang.String team)
        In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team". The coach will select randomly the contestants, this will be the strategy, select random the contestants. The contestants will make one "pool" to see if they are in the array of the players selected.
        Specified by:
        callContestants in interface ICoach
        Parameters:
        team -

      • waitForCallContestants

        public void waitForCallContestants(java.lang.String team,
                                   int idC)
        The contestants will wait here to be called to the trial in the bench. If the the team YXZ is select, then the contestant will verify if there is in the array of selected contestants to do the best in the rope game. When the contestant leaves the bench then is decremented one variable that conunts how many contestants there is in the bench. One more important thing, we need the ID of the last contestant that is up to then inform the coach that all the contestants are ready to go.
        Specified by:
        waitForCallContestants in interface IContestant
        Parameters:
        team - the team identifier
        idC - the contestant ID

      • followCoachAdvice

        public void followCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team,
                              int idC)
        The coaches are waken up in operation followCoachAdvice by the last of their selected contestants to stand in position. In Contestants life cycle, transition between "seat at the bench" and "stand in position"
        Specified by:
        followCoachAdvice in interface IContestant
        Parameters:

        idC -

      • waitForFollowCoachAdvice

        public void waitForFollowCoachAdvice(java.lang.String team)
        The coach will wait until the last contestant stand in position to then follow the coach advice. The flags will be resetted.
        Specified by:
